{{disambiguation}}
The name '''Old Mondstadt''' may refer to one of the following:
* [[Stormterror's Lair]], the modern-day name for the area that was originally known as the City of Mondstadt
* [[Decarabian's Mondstadt]], the nation of Mondstadt and its territory under the rule of [[Decarabian]], the God of Storms
* The era when Mondstadt was ruled by the [[Mondstadt Aristocracy]]
* The symbol colloquially known as the [[Mondstadt/Culture#Old Mondstadt Symbol|Old Mondstadt symbol]], seen on items related to both Decarabian and the Mondstadt Aristocracy
